title_ar: التعبير عن المشاعر: الفرح، الحزن، والغضب
title_en: Expressing Emotions: Happiness, Sadness, and Anger
title_tr: Duyguları İfade Etme: Mutluluk, Üzüntü ve Öfke
objective_ar: تعلم المفردات والعبارات الشائعة للتعبير عن المشاعر الأساسية مثل السعادة، الحزن، الغضب، والدهشة.
objective_en: Learn common vocabulary and phrases to express basic emotions like happiness, sadness, anger, and surprise.
objective_tr: Mutluluk, üzüntü, öfke ve şaşkınlık gibi temel duyguları ifade etmek için yaygın kelime dağarcığını ve ifadeleri öğrenin.

phrases.audio_en_tts_key: I'm very happy. I'm delighted. I'm thrilled.

phrases.ar: هذا خبر رائع! / يا له من يوم رائع!
phrases.en: That's wonderful news! / What a fantastic day!
phrases.tr: Bu harika bir haber! / Ne harika bir gün!
phrases.audio_ar_tts_key: هذا خبر رائع يا له من يوم رائع
phrases.audio_en_tts_key: That's wonderful news! What a fantastic day!
phrases.audio_tr_tts_key: Bu harika bir haber! Ne harika bir gün!

phrases.audio_en_tts_key: I feel sad. I feel upset. I feel down.

phrases.ar: أنا آسف لسماع ذلك. / يا للأسف.
phrases.en: I'm sorry to hear that. / What a pity.
phrases.audio_ar_tts_key: أنا آسف لسماع ذلك يا للأسف
phrases.audio_en_tts_key: I'm sorry to hear that. What a pity.
I'm angry. I'm a bit annoyed. I'm upset.

phrases.ar: هذا غير مقبول! / لا أصدق ذلك!
phrases.en: That's unacceptable! / I can't believe it!
phrases.audio_ar_tts_key: هذا غير مقبول لا أصدق ذلك
phrases.audio_en_tts_key: That's unacceptable! I can't believe it!

phrases.en: Really? / Oh my gosh! / I'm surprised.
phrases.audio_en_tts_key: Really? Oh my gosh! I'm surprised.
